channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- پلاگین پرداخت دلخواه
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- پلاگین پرداخت دلخواه

item.title: CVE-2022-4307|2024-08-03T01:34:50.151Z -- unknown -- %D9%BE%D9%84%D8%A7%DA%AF%DB%8C%D9%86%20%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%AA%20%D8%AF%D9%84%D8%AE%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%87
item.description: The پلاگین پرداخت دلخواه WordPress plugin before 2.9.3 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, allowing unauthenticated attackers to send a request with XSS payloads, which will be triggered when a high privilege users such as admin visits a page from the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2024-6230|2024-07-30T06:00:10.533Z -- unknown -- %D9%BE%D9%84%D8%A7%DA%AF%DB%8C%D9%86%20%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%AA%20%D8%AF%D9%84%D8%AE%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%87
item.description: The پلاگین پرداخت دلخواه WordPress plugin through 2.9.8 does not have CSRF check in place when resetting its form fields, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin perform such action via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-6230|2024-08-01T21:33:05.315Z -- unknown -- %D9%BE%D9%84%D8%A7%DA%AF%DB%8C%D9%86%20%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%AA%20%D8%AF%D9%84%D8%AE%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%87
item.description: The پلاگین پرداخت دلخواه WordPress plugin through 2.9.8 does not have CSRF check in place when resetting its form fields, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin perform such action via a CSRF attack
